content: <@393119312350543872> about this comment: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pull/1163#issuecomment-1437011406 , currently we are testing deploying EOF code (valid/invalid) by testing deploying it using CreateTransaction, or CREATE/CREATE2 opcode within a contract. content: The test suite EOFTests validate the code by running a create transaction. If contract is deployed its states for valid. Using that format you can focus on eof validity and not state tests pre/post validation
